steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/apple'
step 3: Click on link 'iPhone 15' -> Navigate to page ''
step 4: Click objects to buy and proceed to checkout
step 5: Click on button 'Remove'
step 6: Click on link 'Go shopping!'
step 7: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/apple'
step 8: Click on link 'iPhone 15' -> Navigate to page ''
step 9: Click objects to buy and proceed to checkout
step 10: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout ' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 11: Click on input field 'email'
step 12: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 13: Click on input field 'receive marketing info'
step 14: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 15: Click on input field 'delivery id'
step 16: Click on input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 17: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 18: Click on input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 19: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 20: Click on input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 21: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 22: Click on input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 23: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 24: Click on input field 'shipping address.city'
step 25: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.city'
step 26: Click on input field 'shipping address.state'
step 27: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.state'
step 28: Click on input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 29: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 30: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO PAYMENT' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 31: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
